summary: Appearance overhaul on the Volkihar Vampires (excepting Valerica, Serana, and Harkon), as well as Dexion Evicus, Valindor, and Haran.
descriptionHtml:
This is an overhaul on the appearances of the Volkihar Vampires, excluding Valerica, Serana, and Harkon. Also includes alterations to Dexion Evicus. These all use the default head rather than the vampire head to avoid mismatched heads and bodies. This also means that they do not use the vampire normal maps and they therefore won't look constipated like vanilla vampires do. I also altered the skin tones of some NPCs to better reflect their respective races and make the castle a little less pastel. I also included changes to Valindor and Haran, two NPCs you turn in Volkihar radiant quests; I left the third, Cairine, alone as she's supposed to be a beggar and I thought any changes I might make would be ill-fitting.

In all, this affects the appearances of:

Dexion Evicus
Feran Sadri
Fura Bloodmouth
Garan Marethi
Hestla
Modhna
Namasur
Orthjolf
Rargal Thrallmaster
Ronthil
Vingalmo
Valindor
Haran

Required Files:
These are masters that my file relies on. Without proper installation, Skyrim will crash.

Skyrim.ESM
Update.ESM
Dawnguard.ESM

ApachiiHair.ESM
ApachiiHairFemales.ESM
ApachiiHairMales.ESM
XCES.ESP
Brows.ESP
Beards.ESP
TrueBrows.ESP
LovelyHairstylesLITE.ESP

Textures Used:
These aren't technically necessary, but you should use them if you want them to look as they do in my screenshots. Obviously, certain overhauls like Ethereal Elven or others that drastically change the way elves look may not work well with this mod.

Covereyes (Vampire & Blind)
Mature Skin (Clean, no moles version)
Mature Skin New Lips (Clean, no moles version)
Better Males - Geonox
Red Dawnguard Vampire Eyes (Just the meshes)

Compatibility:
In theory, it shouldn't be incompatible with anything save cosmetic modifications to the NPCs listed above. If I'm wrong about that and this is incompatible with something, please let me know.

If you have any files in the directory DataTexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintskyrim.esm named:

author: maeths
